name: DEFENDER OF EARTH VS THE ALIEN ARMADA
description: Defender of Earth vs The Alien Armada is an exciting space themed tower defense game! You play as a general designated as the Defender of Earth, and you will utilize space stations and battle platforms to deploy towers to defend different quadrants of space against 3 alien races.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: I-5 processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 980 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: I-7 processor Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: geforce 1060 Storage: 2 GB available space
